text:
'La rose et le chien: poème perpétuel' (1958) 
by Tristan Tzara 

a perpetual poem, with dials 
ink on cardboard 

(precedes the masterpiece of generative poetry, 'Mille milliards de poèmes' by Raymond Queneau by 3 years)
